alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:31AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Lawrence County through 815 AM EDT... At 731 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Ogdensburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogdensburg, Canton, Lisbon, Heuvelton, Madrid, Morley, Waddington, Chipman and West Potsdam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near the St. Lawrence River, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
